pkgmetadata.longdescription: Rock Solid Package Installation for Legacy R Versions // Make sure packages are available at runtime without any setup. Package installation, reproducibility and exchanging code can be frustrating especially if code is used on older R versions. Often it is hard to puzzle out which package versions are able to work together after some years have passed and packages evolved further and further. The 'wayback' package aims to make this process as painless and robust as possible by using 'MRAN's 'CRAN' snapshots to build local package libraries from way back.
